title: Increase font size in Ghidra
content:
For the record, this is a question I often see:
Especially when using a high-resolution display, fonts and other UI elements can appear extremely small. How can they be enlarged?

answers_data.content:
In Windows, just edit the file: 
\GHIDRA_DIR\support\launch.properties
and add the line: 
VMARGS_WINDOWS=-Dsun.java2d.uiScale=2
A similar command can be used for other systems.
